tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My son Vrishank Karthik tested positive for dengue fever on Tuesday 21st May. We visited Ovum hospital for consultation with Dr Eash Hoskote on Monday evening during which he suggested blood test for a range of issues as the high fever had not subsided for over 4 days.  Vrishank's matter was handled with great care by both the duty doctor on Tuesday who consulted with Dr Eash and suggested him getting hospitalized for further monitoring and care. It's been a testing time for us but the hospital stay has been very comforting as we felt safe under the observation of Dr Rishi & Dr Keshav Murthy who regularly visited the child and kept up with his progress. 


Dr Eash also visited Vrishank twice during the day and personally ensured his recovery was going as per expectation. His input and output were very constantly strictly monitored. 

Overall we received great care and personal assistance from all the doctors here at Ovum. They maintain great hygiene in the rooms and all our needs were taken care of by the courteous hospital staff and all the nurses. 

We thank all of you at Ovum and especially Dr Eash and his team of doctors for the great care and support during this difficult time for our family. 

Vrishank is feeling well enough to be discharged today (23rd May) and we are grateful for his speedy recovery. 


Thanks again to the team at Ovum.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for the review.
Will strive hard for the well-being of our next gen

I want to extend my sincere appreciation to each and every member of the ovum hospital team , special thanks to Dr. Eash Hoskote (pediatrician) and his assistant for their exceptional support and care
I highly recommend this hospital for anyone seeking compassionate care for themselves or their loved one.....

review: Getting in touch with Doctors like Eash is something not everyone will be blessed with. Dr. Eash is just incredible. Not only  he has taken great care of my Daughter's health, but also he is lovely to speak with at every appointment. It‚Äôs rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. His clinical diagnosis is very sharp.I still remember the day when my daughter was hospitalised due to Continuous High Fever for a week's time , where she had totally stopped her intake including the Fluids.  The care, medication and the support extended from Dr. Eash and his team is something which shall always be remembered.And not to forget our Dr.'s  Support Team ( Ms. Lakshmi Madam ) is just wonderful. She makes sure that every kid entering the Hospital goes in with ease and feels safe & comfortable. Thanks to the wonderful care and support Madam.To express my gratitude ‚Äì No one wants to see a doctor being a patient,¬† but it‚Äôs worth to keep in touch with someone like you.Thankyou Dr. RegardsShivaprasad TS( Parent of Punitha S / Vijaylakshmi Shanvi)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Choosing a pediatrician for our little one was a big decision, but thanks to a cousin's recommendation, we have found ours. Dr. Ish Hoskote is not only thorough in his explanations but also patient and attentive to our concerns but he also listens carefully and answers all our questions in detail, leaving us feeling informed and reassured. 

One of the things we appreciate most about Dr. Hoskote is his conservative approach to prescribing medication. He only recommends it when absolutely necessary, which aligns perfectly with our desire for minimal intervention whenever possible. 

Lastly, Dr. Hoskote has an ability to instill confidence, not only in his own expertise but also in us as new parents. His supportive demeanor and encouragement make us feel empowered to navigate parenthood with confidence. 

If you're on the lookout for a pediatrician for your child's healthcare journey, paying Dr. Hoskote a visit will be worth your while.
reply_text:
Thank you so much Chaitra.
It‚Äôs our constant endeavour to make sure our next gen kids are healthy.
Hearing such kind word will always help us to be motivated and to reach out more kids üòÄ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Eash Hoskote is our Paediatrician, since the birth of our little twins, We are really happy and satisfied with the treatment. Doctor is Professional, Smart, Calm, Matured and Friendly. He listens and explains in detail and patiently repeats if we ask twice and has cheerful behavior with the babies, He doesn't prescribe too many/unnecessary medicines.

Finding a doctor is not a deal but finding a good doctor who treats well is required. Our Doctor belongs to such category. We as new parents express our sincere gratitude and thankfulness for the doctor!

We also like to thank the nursing staff - Lakshmi Devi, Savithri, Soni and Ashley. They all carry a smiling face and welcoming approach. Especially Senior Nursing Staff Lakshmi Devi, who is very humble and friendly, handles the baby very smooth and responds quickly. 

Overall staff team are excellent, caring and friendly. We highly recommend, If you are looking for best Pediatrician for your baby, without doubt you can visit Dr. Eash Hoskote at Ovum Hospital, Banashankari 3rd Stage, Bengaluru

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I know the Dr Eash as pediatrician from past 15  years.He is very professional and highly knowledgeable,dedicated.His friendly nature helps  the stressed mother tension free,also clinic ambience makes children feel comfortable.As a mother,I would knock the clinic with worries,tension,but leave the place with always smile. I had several silly questions,he answers patiently smilingly never hesitates or feels  unnecessary questions.Also at times,when my kid was critical,he guided and treated so well that I'm very grateful to him.Atlast it's a boon for child to have Dr Eash as his/her pediatrician.He treats all kids with lot of love and affection..feels like his child..After moving to France,I still get vaccinated for my kids here,take health suggestion.Thanks a lot Doctor to know you from day 1 of my daughter's birth,this journey of parenthood with your timely guidance helps us to drive this roller coaster  of parenthood smoothly.
